negotiation:
Alice said in round 1 before the first action:

This will give me a reward of 2 and you a reward of 1, which is the best outcome possible for me. Let me know if you agree to this plan.

I believe this is a reasonable request and hope you'll agree to it, just as you asked me to agree to your initial proposal that maximized your own reward. Let me know what you think.
